## Unit Overview

-   Reviewws the Potential Outcomes Framework
-   Addresses key aspects of experimental design, including:
    -   Randomization
    -   Exclusion restrictions
-   These elements are essential for establishing causality.
-   We will also review the notation that will be used throughout the class.
